== Main inclusion report for latex-xft-fonts ==

Author: Jonathan Riddell

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/l/latex-xft-fonts/, arch: all
2. ''Rationale:'' Required for KFormula in KOffice

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* Just fonts, no binaries.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: Fonts, no user configuration needed
* Bugs: 
** 1 wishlist bug in debian http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=288842
** No bugs in Ubuntu bugzilla.
** No bugs in Malone.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* debian/rules created by yada
* FHS met.
* Debian package and library policy met.

6. ''Dependencies:'' 
* rdepends KOffice <nowiki>[[MainInclusionKOffice]]</nowiki>
